mods.abstract: Christian Brothers College Student Center was designed by architect, Mel O'Brien, an alumnus; it was dedicated to the memory of Florence Thomas on November 13, 1971. The Thomas Center was designed to include various services for students: Alfonso Dining Hall, named in honor of its long-time director Joe Alfonso; the Bookstore; and various other offices.
